definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: But the athletic men weren't using more sweat glands.
sentences.chinese: 但是这些运动型男性的活跃汗腺数目却不多。

sentences.english: We reported one case of eccrine poroma, which was located on the hip of a 40-year-old man.
sentences.chinese: 我们报道一例40岁男性发生在臀部的小汗腺汗孔瘤。

sentences.english: Sweat gland: Either of two types of perspiration glands in the skin.
sentences.chinese: 汗腺以外，皮肤还包含其他的细小泌腺，叫做皮脂腺。

sentences.english: The tumor was almost completely composed of apocrine cells;
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有肿瘤细胞具有大汗腺分化。

sentences.english: This disease affects the skin of areas of the body bearing sweat glands.
sentences.chinese: 这个病会影响身体带有汗腺区域的皮肤。

sentences.english: Eccrine carcinoma of the sweat gland is rare.
sentences.chinese: 源自汗腺的上皮癌是罕见的。

sentences.english: Starting at puberty, hormones stimulate them to continuously secrete a fatty sweat.
sentences.chinese: 汗腺在青春期由于激素刺激持续分泌一种脂性汗。

sentences.english: In addition to an absence of fingerprints, the condition also leads to a reduction in the number of sweat glands.
sentences.chinese: 除了没有指纹，这种情况还会导致汗腺数量的减少。

sentences.english: Age-related changes to the skin such as poor blood circulation and inefficient sweat glands.
sentences.chinese: 老年性皮肤病变，如血液循环减弱和汗腺功能减退。

sentences.english: In truth, dogs have sweat glands all over their body.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，狗狗全身都有汗腺。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the changes of sweat ducts in nail fold microcirculation among population migrating from plain to plateau.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究进入高原后甲襞微循环中汗腺导管的变化。

sentences.english: The acral sites are the most commonly affected regions. Hip or buttock as a location of origin has rarely been reported.
sentences.chinese: 肢端为最常见部位，臀部小汗腺汗孔瘤很少有报道。

sentences.english: Effect of skin temperature on the cholinergic sensitivity of the human eccrine sweat gland.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤温度对人体外泌汗腺拟胆碱药敏感性的影响。

sentences.english: Many types of bacteria are found on human skin, especially associated with sweat glands and hair follicles.
sentences.chinese: 人体皮肤上有多种细菌，特别是汗腺和毛囊部位。
